t: How would you compare China's JD.com with Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 6): Their Business model is Similar Yes JD wasn’t always that big. It started out as a small brick and mortar store in Beijing, founded in 1998 by Richard Liu. Then in 2004, Liu moved it online and JD.com, short for Jingdong, was born. Fast-forward to today, and the firm is worth ...

t: How Chinese Retailer JD.com Uses AI, Big Data & Robotics To Take On Amazon
